entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:26 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ESE 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
